About Me

I am a Computer Science student and an aspiring Backend Developer specializing in C# and .NET technologies. I have a strong foundation in C++ (OOP & Functional Programming), Data Structures, and Database Management (SQL Server).

Currently learning Angular for frontend development to complement my backend expertise. Through hands-on projects, I gained experience in building maintainable backend systems, implementing clean code practices, and working with real-world scenarios.

My Projects

EduPlatform: Enterprise LMS

EduPlatform is an enterprise-level Learning Management System (LMS) built with ASP.NET Core and Razor Pages. It provides secure, role-based course management, lesson tracking, and a centralized admin dashboard, offering students, instructors, and admins a seamless educational experience.

View Project

AquaCheck Digital Platform

AquaCheck is a production-ready ASP.NET Core MVC platform for dive centers that digitizes diver onboarding and check-ins. It features e-signatures, automated PDF generation, centralized record management, identity-based access, and strong validation for safe diving compliance. Built with .NET 8, EF Core, and QuestPDF, it streamlines operations and eliminates paper workflows.

View Project

Live Demo

Mega Matter E-commerce

Mega Matter is a production-ready ASP.NET Core 8 MVC e-commerce platform built in 3 weeks (~63 hours) as a Computer Science student project. It features full PayPal integration (Sandbox & Live), responsive Bootstrap 5 design, complete product and order management, stock control, reviews and ratings, instant email notifications, and a professional admin dashboard. Developed using SQL Server, Entity Framework Core, Repository Pattern, and ASP.NET Identity, the project includes over 18,000 lines of code and full PayPal API v2 integration. Deployed successfully on runasp.net, this project strengthened my full-stack development, clean architecture, database design, and production deployment skills.

View Project

Live Demo

University Management System

A University Management System built with ASP.NET Core MVC and SQL Server, featuring role-based authentication, course and department management, student portal for applications and results.

View Project

Library Management System

A Book Management System built with ASP.NET Core MVC and SQL Server, supporting book, category, and author management with advanced search and filtering capabilities.

View Project

E-commerce API System

A simple E-Commerce API built with ASP.NET Core that demonstrates CRUD operations, Entity relationships, and JWT Authentication/Authorization.

View Project

Hotel Booking System

Hotel Booking System is a Back_End web application API built with ASP.NET Core, C#, and SQL Server to manage hotel operations efficiently. It includes user authentication, room management, bookings, payments, and customer reviews. The system uses JWT-based security, role-based access, and Entity Framework Core for database operations. Future improvements include advanced room search, front-end UI, real-time notifications, and payment gateway integration.

View Project
